thread.title: A.J.
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by A.J.

author: A.J.
title: A.J.
text: I was nervous about filing for bankruptcy initially. However, after speaking with my advisor at David Sklar and weighing my opinions, I realized that it was the right decision. I had frequent counselling appointments as part of the process, where I received tips on saving, budgeting and planning ahead. It has now been a year and I am really satisfied with my decision and results.
